communications.subject: Illinois Freedom of Information Act. Request: Illinois Flag Submissions
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

All flag submissions submitted to the Illinois Flag Commission. 

On the Illinois Flag Commission site it lists nearly 5,000 submissions. https://www.ilsos.gov/special/IFC/home.html

I would like a copy of each flag submission,  in JPEG, PNG or other appropriate digital format, with applicable redactions made if there is information about the submitter included with a submission. 

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Sanjin Ibrahimovic

communications.subject: RE: External: Illinois Freedom of Information Act. Request: Illinois Flag Submissions
communications.communication: Thank you for your interest in the Illinois Flag Commission.  The Commission members have selected their Top 10 designs from nearly 5,000 entries. To view the Top 10, visit here https://www.ilsos.gov/special/IFC/10finalists.pdf. Public voting will begin online in January 2025. At that time, the Commission will provide further details on where and how you can cast your vote. Thank you!
